data.name: ClientPacketListener_FirstReceivedPacketMustBeConnectAck
data.value: The first packet received from the Server must be a ConnectAck packet. The connection will be closed.

data.name: Client_ConnectionDisconnected
data.value: The client {0} has been disconnected while trying to perform the connection

data.name: Client_ConnectionError
data.value: An error occurred while trying to connect the client {0}

data.name: Client_ConnectionTimeout
data.value: A timeout occured while waiting for the client {0} connection confirmation

data.name: Client_ConnectNotAccepted
data.value: The connect packet of client {0} has not been accepted by the server. Status: {1}. The connection will be closed

data.name: Client_SubscribeError
data.value: An error occurred while trying to subscribe the client {0} to topic {1}

data.name: Client_SubscribeTimeout
data.value: A timeout occured while waiting for the subscribe confirmation of client {0} for topic {1}

data.name: Client_SubscriptionDisconnected
data.value: The client {0} has been disconnected while trying to perform the subscription to topic {1}

data.name: Client_UnexpectedChannelDisconnection
data.value: The underlying connection has been disconnected unexpectedly

data.name: Client_UnsubscribeDisconnected
data.value: The client {0} has been disconnected while trying to perform the unsubscribe to topics: {1}

data.name: Client_UnsubscribeError
data.value: An error occurred while trying to unsubscribe the client {0} of topics: {1}

data.name: Client_UnsubscribeTimeout
data.value: A timeout occured while waiting for the unsubscribe confirmation of client {0} for topics: {1}

data.name: SessionRepository_ClientSessionNotFound
data.value: No session has been found for client {0}

data.value: Client - An error occurred while listening and dispatching packets

data.value: Client {0} - First packet from Server has been received. Type: {1}

data.name: ClientPacketListener_SendingKeepAlive
data.value: Client {0} - No packet has been sent in {1} seconds. Sending Ping to Server to maintain Keep Alive

data.value: Client {0} - Cleaned old session

data.value: Client {0} - Removed client session

data.value: Client {0} - Closing. Reason: {1}

data.value: Client - Packet observable sequence has been completed, hence closing the channel

data.value: Client {0} - Packet Channel observable sequence has been completed

data.value: An error occurred while initializing a client

data.name: MqttChannel_ClientNotConnected

data.value: Received packet of {0} bytes

data.value: Sending packet of {0} bytes

data.value: Disposing {0}...

data.name: ByteExtensions_InvalidBitPosition
data.value: Bit position must be between 0 and 7

data.name: ByteExtensions_InvalidByteIndex
data.value: Byte index must be from 1 to 8, starting from msb

data.name: ConnectAckFormatter_InvalidAckFlags
data.value: Bits 7-1 from Acknowledge flags are reserved and must be set to 0

data.name: ConnectAckFormatter_InvalidSessionPresentForErrorReturnCode
data.value: Session Present flag must be set to 0 for non-zero return codes

data.name: ConnectFormatter_ClientIdMaxLengthExceeded
data.value: Client Id cannot exceed 23 bytes

data.name: ConnectFormatter_ClientIdEmptyRequiresCleanSession
data.value: Client Ids with zero bytes length requires the Clean Session value to be 1 (true)

data.name: ConnectFormatter_InvalidClientIdFormat
data.value: {0} is an invalid ClientId. It must contain only numbers and letters

data.name: ConnectFormatter_InvalidPasswordFlag
data.value: Password Flag must be set to 0 if the User Name Flag is set to 0

data.name: ConnectFormatter_InvalidProtocolName
data.value: {0} is not a valid protocol name

data.name: ConnectFormatter_InvalidReservedFlag
data.value: Reserved Flag must be always set to 0

data.name: ConnectFormatter_InvalidWillRetainFlag
data.value: Will Retain Flag must be set to 0 if the Will Flag is set to 0

data.name: ConnectFormatter_PasswordNotAllowed
data.value: Password value must be null or empty if User value is null or empty

data.name: ConnectFormatter_UnsupportedLevel
data.value: Protocol Level {0} is not supported by the server

data.name: Formatter_InvalidHeaderFlag
data.value: Header Flag {0} is invalid for {1} packet. Expected value: {2}

data.name: Formatter_InvalidPacket
data.value: The packet sent cannot be handled by {0}

data.name: Formatter_InvalidQualityOfService
data.value: Qos value must be from 0x00 to 0x02

data.name: PacketChannelFactory_InnerChannelFactoryNotFound
data.value: An inner channel factory is required to create a new packet channel

data.name: PacketManager_PacketUnknown
data.value: The received packet cannot be handled by any of the registered formatters

data.name: ProtocolEncoding_IntegerMaxValueExceeded
data.value: Integer values are expected to be of two bytes length. The max value supported is 65536

data.name: ProtocolEncoding_MalformedRemainingLength
data.value: Malformed Remaining Length

data.name: ProtocolEncoding_StringMaxLengthExceeded
data.value: String value cannot exceed 65536 bytes of length

data.name: ProtocolFlowProvider_InvalidPacketType
data.value: The packet type {0} cannot be handled by this flow provider

data.name: ProtocolFlowProvider_UnknownPacketType
data.value: An error occured while trying to get a Flow Type based on Packet Type {0}

data.name: PublishFlow_RetryingQoSFlow
data.value: The ack for message {0} has not been received. Re sending message for client {1}

data.name: PublishFormatter_InvalidDuplicatedWithQoSZero
data.value: Duplicated flag must be set to 0 if the QoS is 0

data.name: PublishFormatter_InvalidPacketId
data.value: Packet Id is not allowed for packets with QoS 0

data.name: PublishFormatter_InvalidTopicName
data.value: Topic name {0} is invalid. It cannot be null or empty and It must not contain wildcard characters

data.name: PublishFormatter_PacketIdRequired
data.value: Packet Id value cannot be null or empty for packets with QoS 1 or 2

data.name: PublishReceiverFlow_PacketIdNotAllowed
data.value: Packet Id value is not allowed for QoS 0

data.name: PublishReceiverFlow_PacketIdRequired
data.value: Packet Id value is required for QoS major than 0

data.name: SubscribeAckFormatter_InvalidReturnCodes
data.value: Return codes can only be valid QoS values or a failure code (0x80)

data.name: SubscribeAckFormatter_MissingReturnCodes
data.value: A subscribe acknowledge packet must contain at least one return code

data.name: SubscribeFormatter_InvalidTopicFilter
data.value: Topic filter {0} is invalid. See protocol specification for more details on Topic Filter rules: http://docs.oasis-open.org/mqtt/mqtt/v3.1.1/os/mqtt-v3.1.1-os.html#_Toc398718106

data.name: SubscribeFormatter_MissingTopicFilterQosPair
data.value: A subscribe packet must contain at least one Topic Filter / QoS pair

data.name: TopicEvaluator_InvalidTopicFilter
data.value: The topic filter {0} is invalid according to the protocol rules and configuration

data.name: TopicEvaluator_InvalidTopicName
data.value: The topic name {0} is invalid according to the protocol rules

data.name: UnsubscribeFormatter_MissingTopics
data.value: An unsubscribe packet must contain at least one topic to unsubscribe

data.name: Client_SubscriptionRejected
data.value: The server has rejected the subscription of client {0} to topic {1}

data.name: Client_AlreadyConnected
data.value: The protocol connection cannot be performed because an active connection for client {0} already exists

data.name: Client_AlreadyDisconnected
data.value: The protocol disconnection cannot be performed because the client is already disconnected

data.name: Client_AnonymousClientWithoutCleanSession
data.value: Anonymous clients must set the "cleanSession" parameter to true in order to perform the protocol connection

data.name: WebSocketChannelFactory_WebSocketClient_Failed
